snippet: To the Editor of The New-York Daily Times: The account published in Saturday's Times of the Festival of the State Fair at Rochester contains a remark or two which, in our estimation, should not be suffered to pass unnoticed. The first is this: " I...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor of The New-York Daily Times: The account published in Saturday's Times of the Festival of the State Fair at Rochester contains a remark or two which, in our estimation, should not be suffered to pass unnoticed. The first is this: " In deference to certain prejudices, no wine was introduced, and for the same reason the dancing was not advertised,"
